We reserve the right to edit, remove, or refuse to display any User Content at any time without notice. **External Links:** Links to third-party websites or resources are not our responsibility. You access these links at your own risk. **Errors and Interruptions:** We strive for a reliable service, but technical difficulties or outages may occur. We are not responsible for any damages arising from such issues. **Force Majeure:** We will not be liable for delays or failures in performance due to events beyond our reasonable control, such as acts of God, natural disasters, acts of war, or government regulations. Additional Information We reserve the right to modify these disclaimers at any time without notice. Your continued use of the Website following the posting of changes to the disclaimers constitutes your acceptance of those changes. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - TrinketTreasures: Your Privacy Matters TrinketTreasures HOME ABOUT US Souvenirs Contact Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy elucidates the multifarious protocols we employ at TrinketTreasures to safeguard the confidentiality and integrity of your personal data. We are irrevocably committed to ensuring that your privacy is scrupulously protected. Should we solicit certain information by which you can be identified when utilizing this website, rest assured that it will be employed solely in accordance with this privacy statement. Information Collection and Usage We may collect and process the following data about you: identification details such as your name, contact information inclusive of email address and phone number, demographic particulars such as postcode, preferences, and interests, and other relevant information pertaining to customer surveys and/or offers. This compendium of information is requisitioned to fathom your needs and provide you with superior service, particularly for the following reasons: Internal record keeping Improvement of our products and services Periodic dissemination of promotional emails regarding new products, exclusive offers, or other information which we deem you may find intriguing Occasional contact for market research purposes, conducted via email, phone, or mail Customization of the website according to your interests Security We are assiduously committed to ensuring that your information remains secure. To avert unauthorized access or disclosure, we have instituted suitable physical, electronic, and managerial procedures to safeguard and secure the information we collect online. How We Use Cookies A cookie is a diminutive file which solicits permission to be placed on your computer's hard drive. Once you accord, the file is added, and the cookie assists in the analysis of web traffic or informs you when you visit a particular site. Cookies permit web applications to respond to you as an individual. The web application can tailor its operations to your needs, predilections, and aversions by gathering and recalling information about your predilections. Links to Other Websites Our website may contain links to other websites of interest. However, once you have utilized these links to leave our site, you should note that we do not have any control over that other website. Consequently, we cannot be responsible for the protection and privacy of any information which you provide whilst visiting such sites, and such sites are not governed by this privacy statement. You should exercise caution and peruse the privacy statement applicable to the website in question. TrinketTreasures website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline Souvenir TrinketTreasures Discover the souvenirs and gifts of TrinketTreasures. TrinketTreasures Disclaimers Privacy & Policy Terms & Conditions

pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - TrinketTreasures: Rules and Policies TrinketTreasures HOME ABOUT US Souvenirs Contact TrinketTreasures Terms and Conditions Welcome to TrinketTreasures! These terms and conditions ("Terms") outline the rules and regulations for using our website trinkettreasures.com ("Website" or "Service"). By accessing or using the Website, you agree to these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the Website. 1. Use of Website The Website is intended for individuals 18 years of age or older. By using the Website, you represent and warrant that you are at least 18 years old and of legal capacity to enter into a binding agreement. You may not use the Website for any unlawful purpose or in any way that violates these Terms. You agree to use the Website in a manner consistent with all applicable laws and regulations. 2. User Accounts You may create an account on the Website ("Account"). You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information, including your username and password. You are also responsible for all activity that occurs under your Account. TrinketTreasures reserves the right to suspend or terminate your Account for any reason, at any time, without notice. 3. Orders and Payment If you place an order on the Website, you agree to pay the full amount for the order, including any applicable taxes and shipping fees. We may use a third-party payment processor to facilitate your payment. We reserve the right to cancel or modify your order at any time without notice. 4. Products We strive to provide accurate information on the Website. However, we cannot guarantee that all product descriptions or other content are entirely accurate, complete, reliable, current, or error-free. We reserve the right to discontinue or modify any product offered on the Website at any time without notice. 5. Intellectual Property The Website and its content, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, are the property of TrinketTreasures or its licensors and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not use any content from the Website without our express written permission. 6. Disclaimer THE WEBSITE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. WE DO NOT WARRANT THAT THE WEBSITE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, ERROR-FREE, OR VIRUS-FREE. 7. Limitation of Liability IN NO EVENT SHALL TRINKETTREASURES OR ITS OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, OR AGENTS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH YOUR USE OF THE WEBSITE. 8. Termination We may terminate these Terms or your access to the Website at any time, for any reason, without notice. You may also terminate these Terms by discontinuing your use of the Website. 9. Governing Law These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. 10. Entire Agreement These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and TrinketTreasures regarding your use of the Website. pages.thanks: Thank You - TrinketTreasures: We Appreciate Your Support TrinketTreasures HOME ABOUT US Souvenirs Contact Thank You! Thank you for visiting TrinketTreasures and for your interest in our unique collection of souvenirs and gifts. We truly appreciate your support and are grateful to have you as part of our community. Your enthusiasm for our products inspires us to continue bringing you the finest mementos and keepsakes from around the world. If you have any questions, need assistance, or simply want to share your experience with us, please don't hesitate to contact us. We are here to help and look forward to hearing from you.
